title: The Eureka Story
brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Tom, a year 9 student from Ballarat, completed this story about the causes for the battle “…because it is the most interesting part”.
